attributes.action: Say NO to the development China Gateway, in Thanet, Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SAY NO TO CHINA GATEWAY DEVELOPMENT, KENT.

1:   Will be a huge warehousing hub for distribution of Chinese goods throughout the UK.
2:   If all 3 phases are passed Thanet would lose 275 acres prime farmland in a time of global food shortages.
3:   Buildings will be seen for miles.
4:   Warehousing built on top of Thanet's natural drinking water supply. No contingency plans if water supply is irretrievably damaged or polluted.
5:   17,000 trucking trips PER DAY would be required to distribute goods.
6:   Totally inadequate roads in Thanet. Possible gridlock for Kent.
7:   1000 direct jobs promised. 10% of these for the Chinese. No evidence that the other 90% will give locals quality jobs.
8:   2000 secondary jobs. Developers' Rep. suggested local people required for grass cutting, window cleaning, signage, blinds, vending etc.
9:   With other "regeneration schemes" locally there would appear to be more jobs than unemployed on paper.
10:   Quality of life ruined by noise and air pollution. Kent already has a high incidence of asthema.
11:   Tourism destroyed.
12:   Rural heritage, environment and wildlife destroyed.

DEATH of Thanet. Say NO to China Gateway.
